alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brown, northwestern Calumet, northeastern Winnebago and southeastern Outagamie Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 924 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darboy, or near Appleton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kaukauna and Little Chute around 935 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
